full_text:
📊Why the 2023 NFL Combine was the Fastest on Record

▫️W/ an avg time of 4.69 s, the 2023 #NFLCombine  was the fastest ever
▫️The 40 also saw it's lowest participation rate ever at only 65%
▫️Only the fast players are running = SELECTION BIAS

data: @nflfastR #nflverse
🧵1/4 https://t.co/XXR1kwnVpp

📊Why the 2023 NFL Combine was the Fastest on Record

▫️In the past, players would skip 1 event that they might be very bad at
▫️In 2023 participants skipped as many events as they completed
▫️Players selectively choose events they are good at

data: @nflfastR #nflverse
🧵2/4 https://t.co/IcLVGrx1Ev

📊Why the 2023 NFL Combine was the Fastest on Record

▫️Unsurprisingly, heavier players have preferentially chosen not to run the 40
▫️In 2023 participants who ran the 40 had the lowest avg weight recorded
▫️Lighter players = faster 40s

data: @nflfastR #nflverse
🧵3/4 https://t.co/S7wYAV2y9c

📊Why the 2023 NFL Combine was the Fastest on Record

▫️We can isolate Selection Bias effects by only comparing Top 25 Forty Times from each year (ie fast vs fast)
▫️Top 25 WRs: no change
▫️Top 25 DBs: smaller & faster compared to 10 years ago

data: @nflfastR #nflverse
🧵4/4 https://t.co/0xy2ikwvGa
